desc: AeroTrip is a B2B platform enhancing travel agency workflows. Features include agent registration, login, traveler management, ticket booking, and GDS airline data integration. Built secure forms with Formik & Yup and designed responsive UIs using Tailwind CSS.
technology: TypeScript, Next.js, Redux, RTK Query, Tailwind CSS, Formik, Yup

desc: Automart is an e-commerce platform offering a complete shopping experience. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, and checkout with Laravel and MySQL backend, and jQuery-based frontend interactivity.
technology: React, jQuery, PHP (Laravel), MySQL, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS

desc: A photo-sharing platform where users can browse, like, and comment on photos. Features include Firebase-based authentication, responsive design with Tailwind CSS, and a backend built with Express.js and MongoDB.
technology: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Redux, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, Firebase, MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js

desc: Implemented features like 'Refer A Friend' with Ajax, pre-registration, and app QR code scanning, focusing on UI responsiveness.
technology: PHP (Laravel), MySQL, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, jQuery

desc: Designed UI, implemented API connections, and integrated shopping cart, wishlist, authentication, and payment gateway (bKash, Nagad) with coupon and discount features.
technology: React, React-Redux, PHP (Laravel), MySQL, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS
